Creating a Topic

To create a new topic, click the button. When clicked, it will open the new topic creation form:

Complete the following steps in the form:

  • type in the topic title and description;
  • fill in the Tags field if needed and select an icon;
  • type in the Message text.

You can have new message notifications sent to your e-mail address by enabling the Subscribe to new topic messages option.

Click Post New Topic to create the topic. The topic created will look similar to the following figure:

Subscription Management

To subscribe to new posts and/or new topics, click the button . In the drop-down list, select New posts and/or New topics.

To configure the subscription parameters, click on the context toolbar. The subscription management form will open:

To remove the subscription, click Delete.
